languages.text: "Есть кое-что подходящее из тактик подавления планетарных бунтов: примените каскадное отключение энергии, чтобы вынудить культистов перебрасывать силы с обесточенных мануфакторумов, а "инфоангелы" последуют за ними. В таких условиях схизматикали попытаются получить контроль над центрами подачи энергии — там техножрецы расставят ловушки и уничтожат всех чужаков".

"The tactics playbook for putting down planet-wide revolts has just the thing for this: we begin by ordering a series of cascading power blackouts, thereby forcing the cultists to redeploy their troops away from any manufactorums that have gone offline. The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."
languages.original_text: "Есть кое-что подходящее из тактик подавления планетарных бунтов: примените каскадное отключение энергии, чтобы вынудить культистов перебрасывать силы с обесточенных мануфакторумов, а "инфоангелы" последуют за ними. В таких условиях схизматикали попытаются получить контроль над центрами подачи энергии — там техножрецы расставят ловушки и уничтожат всех чужаков".

traits.locale_text: "The tactics playbook for putting down planet-wide revolts has something we could use. Order a series of cascading power blackouts to force the cultists to redeploy their forces away from manufactorums that have gone offline. The 'data-angels' will follow them. Faced with those circumstances, the schismaticals will try to gain control of power distribution hubs — which is where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

Faced with those circumstances, the schismaticals will try to gain control of power distribution hubs — which is where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

languages.text: "Ein klarer Fall für den taktischen Leitfaden zur Niederschlagung planetarer Revolten: Wir provozieren zunächst einige kaskadierende Stromausfälle und zwingen die Kultisten so, ihre Truppen aus den Manufactorien ohne Energie abzuziehen. Die 'Datenengel' werden ihnen gewiss folgen. Die Schismatiker werden daraufhin versuchen, die Energieverteilungsknoten unter ihre Kontrolle zu bringen ... in denen die Techpriester bereits Fallen vorbereitet haben, die alle Eindringlinge eliminieren werden."
languages.original_text: "The tactics playbook for putting down planet-wide revolts has just the thing for this: we begin by ordering a series of cascading power blackouts, thereby forcing the cultists to redeploy their troops away from any manufactorums that have gone offline. The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

traits.locale_text: "Ein klarer Fall für den taktischen Leitfaden zur Niederschlagung planetarer Revolten: Wir provozieren zunächst einige kaskadierende Stromausfälle und zwingen die Kultisten so, ihre Truppen aus den Manufactorien ohne Energie abzuziehen. Die 'Datenengel' werden ihnen gewiss folgen. Die Schismatiker werden daraufhin versuchen, die Energieverteilungsknoten unter ihre Kontrolle zu bringen ... in denen die Techpriester bereits Fallen vorbereitet haben, die alle Eindringlinge eliminieren werden."

languages.text: "Gezegen çapındaki isyanları bastırmak için taktik kitabında tam da buna uygun bir şey var: Bir dizi ardışık elektrik kesintisi emrederek başlarız, böylece tarikatçıları çevrim dışı olan manufaktorumlardan birliklerini başka yere konuşlandırmaya zorlarız. 'Veri melekleri' de onları kesinlikle takip edecektir. Bölücüler, güç dağıtım merkezlerinin kontrolünü ele geçirmeye çalışarak yanıt verir. Tekno Rahipler, tüm davetsiz misafirleri ortadan kaldırmak için oralara tuzak kurmuş olacak."
languages.original_text: "The tactics playbook for putting down planet-wide revolts has just the thing for this: we begin by ordering a series of cascading power blackouts, thereby forcing the cultists to redeploy their troops away from any manufactorums that have gone offline. The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegen çapındaki isyanları bastırmak için taktik kitabında tam da buna uygun bir şey var: Bir dizi ardışık elektrik kesintisi emrederek başlarız, böylece tarikatçıları çevrim dışı olan manufaktorumlardan birliklerini başka yere konuşlandırmaya zorlarız. 'Veri melekleri' de onları kesinlikle takip edecektir. Bölücüler, güç dağıtım merkezlerinin kontrolünü ele geçirmeye çalışarak yanıt verir. Tekno Rahipler, tüm davetsiz misafirleri ortadan kaldırmak için oralara tuzak kurmuş olacak."

languages.text: «El manual de tácticas para sofocar revueltas a escala planetaria tiene una sección dedicada expresamente a esta situación: empezamos ordenando una serie de apagones en cadena, lo cual obligará a los cultistas a retirar sus efectivos de los manufactorums que dejen de producir. Los «ángeles de datos» los seguirán con toda probabilidad. Los cismáticos responderán intentando tomar el control de los centros de distribución de energía, donde los tecnosacerdotes habrán colocado trampas para eliminar a los intrusos».
languages.original_text: "The tactics playbook for putting down planet-wide revolts has just the thing for this: we begin by ordering a series of cascading power blackouts, thereby forcing the cultists to redeploy their troops away from any manufactorums that have gone offline. The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

traits.locale_text: «El manual de tácticas para sofocar revueltas a escala planetaria tiene una sección dedicada expresamente a esta situación: empezamos ordenando una serie de apagones en cadena, lo cual obligará a los cultistas a retirar sus efectivos de los manufactorums que dejen de producir. Los «ángeles de datos» los seguirán con toda probabilidad. Los cismáticos responderán intentando tomar el control de los centros de distribución de energía, donde los tecnosacerdotes habrán colocado trampas para eliminar a los intrusos».

languages.text: “法务部的战术手册中明确规定了如何应对行星级别的叛乱。首先，我们可以进行大规模断电，迫使那些邪教徒从断电的制造工厂中撤离。在这种情况下，那些‘数据天使’肯定会紧随其后。分离者肯定会打算占领电力分配枢纽，而我们的技术神甫可以提前布下陷阱，一举消灭所有入侵者。”
languages.original_text: "The tactics playbook for putting down planet-wide revolts has just the thing for this: we begin by ordering a series of cascading power blackouts, thereby forcing the cultists to redeploy their troops away from any manufactorums that have gone offline. The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

traits.locale_text: “法务部的战术手册中明确规定了如何应对行星级别的叛乱。首先，我们可以进行大规模断电，迫使那些邪教徒从断电的制造工厂中撤离。在这种情况下，那些‘数据天使’肯定会紧随其后。分离者肯定会打算占领电力分配枢纽，而我们的技术神甫可以提前布下陷阱，一举消灭所有入侵者。”

languages.text: « La stratégie la plus basique employée pour mettre fin à des révoltes planétaires est la suivante : il faut commencer par provoquer des coupures d'électricité en cascade, ce qui forcera ainsi les fanatiques à redéployer leurs troupes loin des manufactorums non alimentés. Les "anges numériques" les suivront à coup sûr. Les schismatiques tenteront alors de répliquer en s'efforçant de s'emparer des centres de distribution d'énergie, où les technoprêtres auront placé des pièges visant à éliminer les intrus. »
languages.original_text: "The tactics playbook for putting down planet-wide revolts has just the thing for this: we begin by ordering a series of cascading power blackouts, thereby forcing the cultists to redeploy their troops away from any manufactorums that have gone offline. The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

traits.locale_text: « La stratégie la plus basique employée pour mettre fin à des révoltes planétaires est la suivante : il faut commencer par provoquer des coupures d'électricité en cascade, ce qui forcera ainsi les fanatiques à redéployer leurs troupes loin des manufactorums non alimentés. Les "anges numériques" les suivront à coup sûr. Les schismatiques tenteront alors de répliquer en s'efforçant de s'emparer des centres de distribution d'énergie, où les technoprêtres auront placé des pièges visant à éliminer les intrus. »

languages.text: 「惑星規模の反乱を潰す作戦マニュアルに、ちょうどいい手がある。まずは連鎖停電を仕掛けて、止まった製造拠点からカルトの兵を引きはがす。『データ・エンジェル』も当然ついていく。分派どもは配電中枢の乗っ取りに動くだろう――そこにはテックプリーストが侵入者を一掃する罠が仕込んである」
languages.original_text: "The tactics playbook for putting down planet-wide revolts has just the thing for this: we begin by ordering a series of cascading power blackouts, thereby forcing the cultists to redeploy their troops away from any manufactorums that have gone offline. The 'data-angels' are sure to follow them. The schismaticals will respond by trying to gain control of the power distribution hubs — where the Tech-Priests will have set traps to eliminate all the intruders."

traits.locale_text: 「惑星規模の反乱を潰す作戦マニュアルに、ちょうどいい手がある。まずは連鎖停電を仕掛けて、止まった製造拠点からカルトの兵を引きはがす。『データ・エンジェル』も当然ついていく。分派どもは配電中枢の乗っ取りに動くだろう――そこにはテックプリーストが侵入者を一掃する罠が仕込んである。」
